text: I'm pretty sure location is fixed on 5x
All is not lost regarding Adam being stuck in Chelsea market. There's another likely bug that is getting triggered.
Which is to say, that its now likely that he IS running into the suspended connection error but that on reconnect, it's missing updates
Hmmm
So consider for a moment that the connection is suspended and on reconnect, were looking for a 5mi displacement
What does the system do
(This is me trying to hypothesize)
Does it "know" about our old request
Or did it lose all internal state and is fresh
(Unfortunately this falls apart because of the min interval)
YES! Adam only lives 4.2 miles from work.
works as expected <<dusts off hands>>
gonna take that into account for the "never zoom" model - because thats the most likely one to exhibit the issue.
Lol
but really, that apparently means that the interval settings are lower priority than the displacement settings
maybe we need a “big city mode"
it actually works out tho - the logic for someone who doesn't want driving zoom would probably be well served by a mile or so displacement
i pushed the code if anyone wants to mess with it for fun
warning: its not very fun at all

attachments.text: As you may have seen in the Support Lib 23.2.0 blog post, AppCompat now has a new theme family: Theme.AppCompat.DayNight…

text: Ooooh
If the full tile size represents something like 7 miles of map, I wonder if the displacement should be half that
